long_description: The ultralight, freestanding Big Agnes Seedhouse SL3 tent is for 3 backpackers (or 2 and a dog) who like to count ounces and still have a little elbow room to read at night. Seedhouse SL3 is simple, efficient and classic; it's built for adventures like cross-country bike tours or those weekend peaks you've been looking to bag. Hub/pole system is super lightweight and tent body attaches quickly and easily to the pole frame with plastic clips; fabric loops along the ridge pole increase weight savings. Innovative pole design provides exceptional headroom without excess weight. 1 large door allows easy entry/exit for 3 occupants. Walls are constructed of woven nylon mesh, providing excellent ventilation and 360deg views. Rainfly and seamless floor are made of high-tenacity ripstop nylon and are both polyurethane- and silicone-coated for waterproofness and durability. Light yet strong, DAC Featherlite(R) NSL pole system with pressed-in connectors and lightweight hubs are anodized without the use of harmful acids. Includes 4 interior mesh pockets and loops for a gear loft (holds a Big Agnes Large Trapezoid Loft or Entertainment Center Loft, not included). All seams on tent body and fly are sealed with waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane seam tape; vestibule stormflap protects zipper from the elements. Big Agnes Seedhouse SL3 includes stuff sacks, 11 superlight aluminum J-stakes, and reflective guylines and webbing on tent corners. Save weight and create a minimalist shelter by using just the rainfly, footprint (sold separately), poles and stakes.
short_description: The ultralight, freestanding Big Agnes Seedhouse SL3 tent is for 3 backpackers (or 2 and a dog) who like to count ounces and still have a little elbow room to read at night.
